about_the_game:
Blue Scout class set of 20th level with random parameters for Elemental Heroes
Will be very useful in 3rd Portal and against Raid Bosses.

To get the purchased set, you will need to:
1. restart the game and look into the in-game mail.
2. find a message from SERVER, get it and close the in-game mail.
3. open the inventory and find a new box, once double clicked it will give you all the items which you will be able to wear.

WARNING! If you have several characters, this DLC will be delivered to the first character who will enter the game and check the in-game mail! Be careful!
detailed_description:
Blue Scout class set of 20th level with random parameters for Elemental Heroes
Will be very useful in 3rd Portal and against Raid Bosses.

To get the purchased set, you will need to:
1. restart the game and look into the in-game mail.
2. find a message from SERVER, get it and close the in-game mail.
3. open the inventory and find a new box, once double clicked it will give you all the items which you will be able to wear.

WARNING! If you have several characters, this DLC will be delivered to the first character who will enter the game and check the in-game mail! Be careful!
